page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT MOTHERS
page.content: There are seven mothers who are housewives in class 3 of West Grimstead school, two are nurses one an Auxiliary nurse and the other as a Mental nurse .One of the mothers is a stock controller .She works at Great Mills DIY and orders stock when the stock in the warehouse is running low. A mother writes stories for a living and another works as a waitress .One mother works as a hairdresser .She cuts hair and styles it .There is a mother who is a secretary and another is a Super market cashier .She works on the tills punching in the numbers on the tills and giving the customer their receipt.
